âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Multiple RAG retrieval methods (Similarity Search, Keyword Search, Graph Retrieval, KAG) â€¢ Reciprocal Rank Fusion (RRF) for combining multiple retrieval methods â€¢ Built on PostgreSQL vector database â€¢ Modular architecture â€¢ Advanced RAG pipeline creation
ðŸ“– Summary: Hector RAG is a modular RAG framework built on PostgreSQL, designed for creating advanced AI applications. It offers multiple retrieval methods, including similarity, keyword, and graph-based approaches, combined with Reciprocal Rank Fusion. The framework's modular architecture allows for easy customization and integration into existing systems.
